title: Places to eat
textContent:
You will find here a small kitchen with dishes, refrigerator, microwave and a stove. You can cook but after please leave the kitchen clean :)
We can also book a neighbor who can come here to cook for you or we can organize to eat homemade meals in the village at the locals. Please tell us if you want that when you make a booking or when you arrive in Rosia.

title: Grocery stores
textContent: There are 3 grocery stores around the house (~5min).

seeAlso.text: You can see here how to reach them from Casa Petri...

title: Free Wifi
textContent: We have free wifi in all the rooms and also in the garden in the hammock so don't forget to 'check in on facebook' :P

title: Emergencies
textContent: In the kitchen you will find a medical kit and in each room you will find a fire extinguisher. The emergency number in Romania is 112

title: Parking
textContent: There are parking spots beside the asphalted road by the house. If you wish we also have space in the yard.

title: Board Games
textContent: We have board games: Activity, Risk, Saboteour, Chess and others...
